componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This person is deceased and has been removed from contact lists. We share our heartfelt condolences to their family and community.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Help build a strong community by logging ALL engagement with Alumni members.


  • Log engagement (for 1 - 20 Alumni) using the multi-logger form below.
  • Log Alumni emails via the Salesforce extension for Google Mail. You can also send emails direct from Salesforce using the Email button below.
  • Photos - To add or update a headshot photo please send the image to Community & Partnerships staff for resizing and uploading.
